sentences.en: A cage or cluster is in a certain sense the antithesis of a complex.
sentences.cn: 笼状和簇状结构在某种意义上是结合物的对立面.

sentences.en: Antithesis is a traditional and characteristic rhetoric figure of Chinese language.
sentences.cn: 对偶是汉语传统的特有的修辞手法.

sentences.en: His creation was an antithesis to academic dogmatism of the time.
sentences.cn: 他的创作与当时学院派的教条相对立.

sentences.en: Joy is the antithesis of sorrow.
Love is the antithesis of selfishness.
She seems friendly, spontaneous, outgoing - the absolute antithesis of " computer geek. "
sentences.cn: 她看上去友善 、 自然 、 大方 —— 照说应该是 “ 计算机怪杰(computergeek) ” 之类的决然对立面.

sentences.en: Smallness is the antithesis of largeness.
Soft: antithesis of brisk and indicating a badly fired tea.
sentences.cn: 软: 对立面旺盛显示一架发射了茶.

sentences.en: The antithesis of Apollo and Dionysus is sublated and united in tragedies.
sentences.cn: 悲剧的日神因素和酒神因素这一对立在悲剧中被扬弃而归于统一.

sentences.en: The antithesis of death is life.
The antithesis of the Middle Eastern buyer is the Japanese.
sentences.cn: 与中东买主截然相反的是日本买主。

sentences.en: The company represented the antithesis of everything he admired.
sentences.cn: 那家公司与他所崇尚的一切完全相反.

sentences.en: The style of his speech was in complete antithesis to mine.
sentences.cn: 他和我的讲话方式完全相反.

sentences.en: This insecurity is infuriating and the antithesis of considerate human behavior.
sentences.cn: 这种不安全感简直令人生气,它完全违背了人类的体贴.

sentences.en: This is the antithesis of the cleaning tip.
sentences.cn: 与做清洁的技巧刚刚相反.

sentences.en: When you write a couplet, pay attention to antithetic parallelism and antithesis.
sentences.cn: 写对联时要注意排偶对仗.
